titleStmt.title: The last words of Coll. Richard Rumbold, Mad. Alicia Lisle, Alderman Henry Cornish, and Mr.Richard Nelthrop who were executed in England and Scotland for high treason in the year 1685.
titleStmt.author: Rumbold, Richard, 1622?-1685.
Lisle, Alice, 1614?-1685.
Nelthorpe, Richard, d. 1685.
Cornish, Henry, d. 1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
